documentation.text: @dev Returns the total amount of tokens in vesting plan.
@dev Returns the total releasable amount of tokens.
@dev Returns the total released amount of tokens.

@dev Unlocks all releasable amount of tokens.
 Emits a {TokensReleased} event.
@dev Returns the total amount of tokens in vesting plan.
@dev Returns the total releasable amount of tokens.
@dev Returns the total released amount of tokens.

@dev Unlocks all releasable amount of tokens.
 Emits a {TokensReleased} event.

releasable().details: Returns the total releasable amount of tokens.

releaseAll().details: Unlocks all releasable amount of tokens. Emits a {TokensReleased} event.

released().details: Returns the total released amount of tokens.

total().details: Returns the total amount of tokens in vesting plan.
